description.ko: 유리 심장의 정밀함을 통해 수천 가지 가능성으로 부서지는 한 줄기 빛.
description.en: A single beam of light shattered into a thousand possibilities through the precision of a glass heart.

prompt: An intricate glass sculpture of a complex polyhedral fractal, hit by a concentrated beam of white light. Spectral dispersion and light splitting into vivid rainbows. Focus on refractive indices, crystal facets, and chromatic aberration. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits. Detailed rainbow caustics dance across the background. Global illumination and cinematic lighting capture the pure energy of the spectrum contained within the glass.
